sentences.en: Andrew, with binoculars, was already scanning the dockside and port buildings coming into view.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁举起了望远镜, 扫视着进入视野的码头和港口上的建筑物.

sentences.en: Binoculars optical - Binoculars, fieldscope, range finder for golf, hunt etc.
sentences.cn: 光学望远镜 - 望远镜, 观鸟镜, 高尔夫球测距仪, 狩猎测距仪之类.

sentences.en: Binoculars: equipment you look through to make things far away seem closer.
sentences.cn: 双眼望远镜: 一种设备,你可以透过它,使很远的东西看起来很近.

sentences.en: Collet aimed the binoculars up the hill and adjusted image intensifier dials.
sentences.cn: 科莱把望远镜对着小山丘,调节着镜筒.

sentences.en: He raised the binoculars to his eye again, scanning across the scene.
sentences.cn: 他再一次把双筒望远镜举到眼前，仔细观察整个现场。

sentences.en: I put down my binoculars and popped a Budweiser.
sentences.cn: 我放下望远镜,拉开一罐百威啤酒喝了起来.

sentences.en: If I had binoculars, I could see that comet clearly.
sentences.cn: 如果我有望远镜, 我就可以清楚地看见那颗彗星.

sentences.en: Mike: Only if he uses binoculars!
sentences.cn: 迈克: 除非他用望远镜.
南希冒险用了一下望远镜.

sentences.en: Practice thesepaths several times with binoculars, and then repeat the one which works bestfor you using the finder of your telescope.
sentences.cn: 用双筒望远镜练习这些路径几次，然后使用你的望远镜的寻星镜重复最适合的一个路径。

sentences.en: She runs up and takes the binoculars.
The man focused some binoculars on the green peninsula ahead .
sentences.cn: 男人拿起双筒望远镜眺望前面那青翠的半岛。

sentences.en: Tourist: Too bad! I left my binoculars in car.
sentences.cn: 游客: 真是糟糕! 我把随身携带的望远镜放在游览车上了.

sentences.en: Use binoculars and you can get a whole view of the city.
sentences.cn: 使用双倍望远镜,你可以看到这座城市的全景.

sentences.en: What are you going to do about it with your goddamn binoculars?
sentences.cn: 你手里拿着望远镜要怎么杀我 呢 ?

sentences.en: You grab your binoculars or your camera at once.
sentences.cn: 你就立刻抓起望远镜或照像机来.

sentences.en: You OK, holmes, we been watching from the pier with binoculars!
sentences.cn: 你还好吧, 伙计, 我们用望远镜一直在监视这个码头!

sentences.en: You ought to look through binoculars.

trans.tran_en: a pair of special glasses, that you hold up to your eyes to look at objects that are a long distance away
